Game.Name: Kung Fu Panda 2
Game.Plot: Kung Fu Panda 2 is a video game, loosely based on the film of the same name. The game was released across various platforms on May 24, 2011.[2] The Xbox 360 version requires Kinect. This and The Penguins of Madagascar: Dr. Blowhole Returns â€“ Again! were the only 2 DreamWorks Animation games to use the uDraw GameTablet
